tweet:
Just witnessed the first woman Speaker of the US House of Representatives address the Ghanaian parliament.

This is how you send a signal of mutual respect and partnership, not just to Ghana but to the continent of Africa as a whole. 

Thank you @SpeakerPelosi for being a LEADER. pic.twitter.com/TyntyPAH2e

For so many of us, this is where our ancestors left the continent for the last time. 

On Monday, I spoke with @AprilDRyan about our trip to #Ghana for the #YearOfReturn. http://aurn.com/congressional-black-caucus-visit-ghana-commemorating-arrival-of-africans-in-us/ …

This year marks 400 years after the first enslaved Africans arrived in North America. 

Today, Trump went to where they were taken. 

Today, we went to where they were taken from. 

#Ghana #YearOfReturn pic.twitter.com/WezScWMO4P

400 years ago this year, our ancestors were first brought to North America in chains. 

Today, 13 members of the Congressional Black Caucus returned to the dungeons in Ghana, where the enslavement of our ancestors began, as Members of the United States Congress. pic.twitter.com/B6dqeg4k36

When I first went to the Door of No Return in Ghana 20 years ago, I never thought I'd return as a Member of Congress. 

Today, we returned. 

#YearofReturn pic.twitter.com/mBaFm5gMHO

Ghana is a country of rich opportunity and great power. 

Yesterday, @SpeakerPelosi, Members of @TheBlackCaucus and I met with President @NAkufoAddo and US Amb. Sullivan reaffirming our commitment to the ties that bind our nations: freedom, democracy, justice & security. pic.twitter.com/UjJHi5H29j

Tiene el derecho a permanecer en silencio y no tiene que explicar su estado migratorio o de ciudadanía con la policía.

#KnowYourRights if a law enforcement officer asks about your immigration status:

You have the right to remain silent and do not have to discuss your immigration or citizenship status with police.

Stop calling the children molested by Jeffrey Epstein "young women".

A minor is a CHILD, a 14 year-old or a 15 year-old is a CHILD.

Call Esptein what he is — a child rapist.

Sex before the age of consent is statutory rape, a child can NOT give consent.

Acosta charged Epstein with "procuring a minor for prostitution".

A minor is a child and "procuring" a child makes Epstein a pedophile, a child rapist, and a child molester.

A child can NOT consent to sex. A child can NEVER be a prostitute.

Stop referring to the asylum seekers being abused at our border as "aliens". They are BABIES.
